title: I Love You the World
description: Kids and mothers alike will love this endearing book which demonstrates the depth of a mother's love. When Mama sets out to explain her feelings for Little Bunny, "I love you the world," sums it all up. To prove it, she compares his attributes to all the wonders she can imagine - including a row of rainbows in all shapes and sizes, a treasure chest overflowing with jewels and a velvety, green hillside alive with the prettiest of butterflies. Not surprisingly, Bunny finds out they would all fall short of the mark in this engaging story of a Mother's caring and love. - Adorable bright illustrations demonstrates this heartwarming story of the love between a parent and child. - Loveable characters - Embossing with spot varnish on cover - Special "This book belongs " box on inside front cover makes this a perfect gift book.
author: Allia Zobel Nolan
